channel.title: Dadding on jra's thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in Dadding on jra's thoughts

item.title: I'm still here...
item.description:
While I was working for the DEDIS lab at EPFL, I was not writing here.

Now I’m a dad at home, at least until my youngest starts school in a year, and so I’m still not writing here.

I work at Pie AÃ©ronefs, where I do various kinds of open source work, most of it on GitHub.

When I’ve got my head fully back into the kinds of things I like to write about here, I’ll write again.
